contents.content: This policy is underwritten by Chubb Insurance Singapore Limited. Co. Regn. No. 199702449H.
Full details of the terms, conditions and exclusions of this insurance are provided for in the
Indulge in stress-free travel for your next holiday!

• One-off payment of SGD10 after first 120 minutes of Flight Delay
  • Additional SGD10 for each additional 60-minute period of Flight Delay (After the first 120 minutes of Flight Delay)
SGD5,000 payout for accidental Death and Permanent Disability while Overseas

• If, during the Period of Insurance, while you are overseas, you suffer an Accidental Injury which results in Your Accidental Death or Your Permanent Disablement, We will pay to Your estate the Accidental Death compensation or to You the Permanent Disablement compensation according to the scale stated in the Table of Benefits, up to the maximum sum insured specified

• This product is applicable exclusively for departures from Changi Airport only.
  • The maximum duration of coverage for each trip is 14 days.
  • Applicant must be between 18 and 85 years old
  • The campaign period for this insurance product is three (3) months.

props.label: Flight No.
props.description: For flights departing from Singapore Changi Airport only

contents.content: You can find your flight number on your flight itinerary or booking confirmation. The flight number is in an alphanumeric format that starts with two letters followed by numerical digits, e.g. SQ123.
Enter the destinations (up to 5) where you are travelling to on your journey.

contents.content: Enter the start date of your trip (i.e. the day you leave Singapore) and enter the return date of your trip (i.e. the day you arrive in Singapore)

contents.content: You must fully and faithfully disclose all facts which you know or should know. Otherwise, the policy may be void.
By applying for Complimentary Flight Delay Cover, you confirm that you have read the Policy Wording and agree to the Terms and Conditions.

By submitting, I consent to receiving marketing offers from Chubb through my email and Singapore telephone number, regardless of my current or future registration with the Singapore Do Not Call Registry.

I consent for Chubb to collect, use, disclose, and process my information in accordance with their Privacy Notices. This may include sharing my information with parties mentioned in the policy, some of which may be located outside of Singapore. To learn more, please visit www.chubb.com/sg-privacy.
Thank you for applying for Complimentary Flight Delay Cover!
We will send your Policy Document to
Upgrade your Flight Delay Cover when you purchase TravellerShield Plus!

About TravellerShield Plus
  • A travel insurance plan that provides the comprehensive coverage you need for all your holidays

Coverage includes
  • Overseas medical or hospitalisation expenses (Up to SGD 1,000,000
  • Baggage loss or damage (up to SGD 8,000)
  • Travel inconveniences and overseas medical expenses due to COVID-19 for your Single Trip plan
Maintenance activity going from 4 PM. Application will be available after 5 PM
